name: 梅根·库尔曼
introduction: Megan was plucked from obscurity by Rob Schneider and Tom Brady to make her motion picture debut in "The Hot Chick."A graduate of South High School, Megan played in the Mission Band alongside Josh Hartnett's Sky Masterson in their school production of "Guys and Dolls."She had an even better experience on "The Hot Chick" set, where she got to be a cheerleader for the first time, got to use her real-life flute-playing expertise, and, on her first day of work, got to eat large quantities of ice cream with sprinkles and strawberry syrup [before learning about the spit bucket].
